OOC: I kinda am not at my house... =)

--- Astroblast / Rippersnapper ---

Astroblast covers his optics, as Torca's nails riddle him, some 
sticking into his armour slightly, some deflecting away. One nail 
pierced a join on his left arm, disabling most movement from that 
side. He shakes his head, brushing nails off him. "Stupid Maximals!" 
Astroblast starts running towards Torca and Klant, firing twice from 
his rifle, and twice from his twin chin lasers, both times at the 
originator of the nails, Torca.

--------------------------------------------

Rippersnapper leaps backwards away from Orion, but he isn't that 
lucky, Orion's sword cuts a nice groove in his nose. "Aiiee," 
Rippersnapper's expression changes from one of shock, to one of pure 
animalistic anger. "Rippersnapper will tear apart stinging Maximal!" 
Rippersnapper rushes Orion, fireing another missile, mechafluid 
leaking from his slash.
